member.summary: The is an overridable function which gets called when an event is requested using "HTTPPost" from a webpage Default implimentation fires the USD event with the data parameters passed and following are the supported parameters 1) EventName parameter contians the usd event raised. 2) PostData parameter contains the HTTP post content in binary format. 3) Header parameter contians the content type as header information 4)TargetFrameName parameter contians the targeted frame name. 5) Any key value pairs passed as part of query string will be added as parameters to the event fired.
member.param: Url on which the event is raised
